long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whack 'em all Offline Version (Only 1MB)

INTRODUCTION
Play Whack 'em all on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Whack 'em all extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Whack 'em all icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Whack 'em all popup will open. Tap on the popup or press "Spacebar" to start ;)
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tap the moles to get them
